emptyTitle: How can I help you today?
emptySubtitle: Select text in your document and ask me anything
userPromptPlaceholder: Please input user prompt, this prompt will be prepended to the input box content
builtinPromptsDescription: Customize the system and user prompts for built-in tools like Translate, Polish, Academic, Summary, and Grammar. Use {language} for the target language placeholder and {text} for the selected text placeholder.
emptyAPIKey: Go to settings to set API key
wordToolsDescription: Built-in tools that AI agents can use to interact with your Word document.
wordTool_getSelectedText_desc: Get the currently selected text in the Word document.
wordTool_getDocumentContent_desc: Get the full content of the Word document body as plain text.
wordTool_insertText_desc: Insert text at the current cursor position in the Word document.
wordTool_replaceSelectedText_desc: Replace the currently selected text with new text.
wordTool_appendText_desc: Append text to the end of the document.
wordTool_insertParagraph_desc: Insert a new paragraph at the specified location with optional styling.
wordTool_formatText_desc: Apply formatting (bold, italic, underline, font size, color, highlight) to selected text.
wordTool_searchAndReplace_desc: Search for text in the document and replace it with new text.
wordTool_getDocumentProperties_desc: Get document statistics including paragraph count, word count, and character count.
wordTool_insertTable_desc: Insert a table at the current cursor position with specified rows and columns.
wordTool_insertList_desc: Insert a bulleted or numbered list at the current position.
wordTool_deleteText_desc: Delete the currently selected text or delete at cursor position.
wordTool_clearFormatting_desc: Clear all formatting from selected text, returning it to default style.
wordTool_setFontName_desc: Set the font name/family for selected text (Arial, Times New Roman, etc.).
wordTool_insertPageBreak_desc: Insert a page break at the current cursor position.
wordTool_getRangeInfo_desc: Get detailed information about the current selection including text and formatting.
wordTool_selectText_desc: Select all text in the document.
wordTool_insertImage_desc: Insert an image from a URL at the current cursor position.
wordTool_getTableInfo_desc: Get information about tables in the document.
wordTool_insertBookmark_desc: Insert a bookmark at the current selection to mark a location.
wordTool_goToBookmark_desc: Navigate to a previously created bookmark in the document.
wordTool_insertContentControl_desc: Insert a content control container at the current selection.
wordTool_findText_desc: Find text in the document and return information about matches.
wordTool_searchWeb_desc: Search the web for information and return the results.
